Class_Des_Page.Title: The Guardian Class
Class_Des_Page.Des: You value security above all else. As a result, you desire the means to protect yourself from the harsh forces of nature.

Class_Des_Page.Title: The Medic Class
Class_Des_Page.Des: You value safety above all else. As such, you aim to lessen or outright eliminate the damage that disasters leave in their wake.

Class_Des_Page.Title: The Hunter-Gatherer Class
Class_Des_Page.Des: You value sustainability above all else. Consequently, you strive to keep yourself in optimal condition and are always thinking ahead.

Class_Des_Page.Title: The Navigator Class
Class_Des_Page.Des: You value rescue above all else. Therefore, you aspire to find the best path through a bad situation and arenâ€™t afraid to call on others for support.

Class_Des_Page.Title: The Jack-of-All-Trades Class
Class_Des_Page.Des: You value versatility above all else. Appropriately, you seek the ability to improvise and adapt to any situation.
